verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \add That\add* the \w heir|strong="G2818"\w*, as long \w as|strong="G3745"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, \w differeth|strong="G1308"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w from|strong="G1308"\w* a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, \w though|strong="G1401"\w* he \w be|strong="G5607"\w* \w lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w tutors|strong="G2012"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w governors|strong="G3623"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* the time \w appointed|strong="G4287"\w* of the \w father|strong="G3962"\w*.

\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* we \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w children|strong="G3516"\w*, \w were|strong="G1510"\w* in \w bondage|strong="G1402"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w elements|strong="G4747"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* of the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* was \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* sent \w forth|strong="G1821"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,

To \w redeem|strong="G1805"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w were|strong="G2443"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we might \w receive|strong="G0618"\w* the adoption of \w sons|strong="G5206"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath sent \w forth|strong="G1821"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w crying|strong="G2896"\w*, \w Abba|strong="G0005"\w*, \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w* thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w then|strong="G2532"\w* an \w heir|strong="G2818"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G0235"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w*, when ye knew \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, ye did \w service|strong="G1398"\w* unto them \w which|strong="G3588"\w* by \w nature|strong="G5449"\w* \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w gods|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, after that ye have \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w or|strong="G1161"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* are \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* turn \w ye|strong="G1994"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w weak|strong="G0772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beggarly|strong="G4434"\w* \w elements|strong="G4747"\w*, \w whereunto|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* to be in \w bondage|strong="G1398"\w*?

Ye \w observe|strong="G3906"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w years|strong="G1763"\w*.

I am afraid \w of|strong="G5399"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3381"\w* I have \w bestowed|strong="G2872"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w labour|strong="G2872"\w* in \w vain|strong="G1500"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, I \w beseech|strong="G1189"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \add am\add*; for \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \add am\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add are\add*: ye \w have|strong="G0091"\w* \w not|strong="G3762"\w* \w injured|strong="G0091"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* at all.

Ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G3754"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w infirmity|strong="G0769"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* I preached the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* at the \w first|strong="G4386"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w temptation|strong="G3986"\w* which \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* ye \w despised|strong="G1848"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w rejected|strong="G1609"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add even\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Where|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2258"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w blessedness|strong="G3108"\w* ye spake \w of|strong="G5216"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w record|strong="G3140"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \add it had been\add* \w possible|strong="G1415"\w*, ye would have plucked \w out|strong="G1846"\w* your \w own|strong="G5216"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, and have given \w them|strong="G1325"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

Am \w I|strong="G1096"\w* \w therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w*, because I \w tell|strong="G0226"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0226"\w*?

They zealously \w affect|strong="G2206"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \add but\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*; \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, they \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w exclude|strong="G1576"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might \w affect|strong="G2206"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \add it is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* to be zealously \w affected|strong="G2206"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add a\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \add thing\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* when \w I|strong="G3165"\w* am \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w My|strong="G3450"\w* little \w children|strong="G5040"\w*, of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I travail in \w birth|strong="G5605"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* be \w formed|strong="G3445"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*,

I \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* to be \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w change|strong="G0236"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* I stand in \w doubt|strong="G0639"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w Tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, ye \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, do \w ye|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w*, the \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* a \w bondmaid|strong="G3814"\w*, the \w other|strong="G1520"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* a \w freewoman|strong="G1658"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \add who was\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w bondwoman|strong="G3814"\w* was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w freewoman|strong="G1658"\w* \add was\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*.

Which \w things|strong="G3748"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* an \w allegory|strong="G0238"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w the|strong="G1242"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w covenants|strong="G1242"\w*; the \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w Sinai|strong="G4614"\w*, which \w gendereth|strong="G1080"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bondage|strong="G1397"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Agar|strong="G0028"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w Agar|strong="G0028"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w Sinai|strong="G4614"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Arabia|strong="G0688"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* answereth \w to|strong="G4960"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* is in \w bondage|strong="G1398"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w above|strong="G0507"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w Rejoice|strong="G2165"\w*, \add thou\add* \w barren|strong="G4723"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w bearest|strong="G5088"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; break \w forth|strong="G4486"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cry|strong="G0994"\w*, thou \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w travailest|strong="G5605"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the desolate \w hath|strong="G2048"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* she \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* an \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w as|strong="G2596"\w* Isaac \w was|strong="G2464"\w*, \w are|strong="G2070"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w persecuted|strong="G1377"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \add that was born\add* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \add it is\add* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G0235"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*? Cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* the \w bondwoman|strong="G3814"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of the \w bondwoman|strong="G3814"\w* \w shall|strong="G2816"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w heir|strong="G2816"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of the \w freewoman|strong="G1658"\w*.

So \w then|strong="G0686"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of the \w bondwoman|strong="G3814"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* of the \w free|strong="G1658"\w*.
